content:
The controversial issue of abortion surfaced again after supporters of the Unborn Victims of Violence Act gained a victory after the U.S PERIOD House of Representatives voted  in favor of the bill on March  PERIOD

Now the bill also known as  is in the hands of President Bush who has shown his support and is expected to sign it PERIOD The bill allows criminals to be charged with two counts of murder if a pregnant woman is killed PERIOD

Defenders of abortion rights were concerned that the law would be giving rights to a fetus which was against their objective PERIOD Opposers of the bill felt it was an attempt to redefine the term 

Corinne Rovetti nurse practitioner and director of the Knoxville Center for Reproductive Health Inc. which provides women with gynecological care STD tests and abortions said that most of the center disagreed with the law PERIOD

 Rovetti said PERIOD 

White House staff and other backers of the bill say they are strongly in support of protecting the rights of the unborn PERIOD

Paul Dunn project manager for Tennessee Right to Life explained that the crime must happen on federal property PERIOD He said if a disgruntled employee entered a post office killing a large number of people including a woman who was seven months pregnant that employee should be charged for the death of that child as well as the rest of the people PERIOD

 Dunn said PERIOD

Other supporters of the bill said that  states already supported this law and the federal law needed to be consistent with these states PERIOD In the upholding states those who assault pregnant women can be charged with two crimes when an unborn child is harmed and can be charged with two counts of murder if a pregnant woman is killed PERIOD

 Jessica Pipkin sophomore in sports management said PERIOD

The bill was named  after Laci Peterson was brutally murdered last year while pregnant with her unborn son Connor PERIOD Lacis husband Scott Peterson is currently on trial for the murder his wife and child PERIOD

 Luke Gustafson freshman in international business said PERIOD

Prolife groups recently criticized presidential hopeful Sen PERIOD John Kerry DMA for his vote last week against the bill PERIOD Many democrats feel that the need to protect abused women was put second to abortion politics PERIOD

Laura Blackwood administrator for The Hope Center said the bill does not specifically include abortion so the bill should not be so controversial PERIOD She explained the bill excludes abortion medical treatment or any other steps the mother takes to terminate the pregnancy PERIOD

 Blackwood said PERIOD
